content: dive into this fun and easy crochet tutorial where you ll learn to create your very own sad hamster meme amigurumi this step-by-step guide is perfect for both beginners and experienced crocheters follow along with our free pattern and make this adorable and viral crochet project in no time don t forget to share your creations in the comments and tag us on social media enjoy crocheting this cute and quirky piece and subscribe to our channel for more amazing tutorials and free patterns materials super bulky - grey 11gr pink 1gr i used himalaya dolphin baby 5 5mm crochet hook sport yarn - white 1gr 2 75mm crochet hook pins fiberfill scissors stitch markers yarn needle for sewing plastic eyes 10mm
